description:
2 years ago we saw the launch of Intel ARC Alchemist and it was interesting at the time but not something I was going to buy but since we haven't really heard much, at least until some driver updates came into the kernel.

title: Intel ARC Battlemage Hasn't Been Cancelled... Yet
